5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Aishah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Whoever vomits, has a nosebleed, belches, or emits prostatic fluid, should stop praying; perform ablution, then resume his prayer, and while he is in that state he should not speak.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْبِنَاءِ عَلَى الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning resuming the Prayer
